product_name: Komperdell Peak Hunter Junior Kids' Trekking Poles - Pair - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Komperdell Peak Hunter Junior Kids' Trekking Poles offer added stability and comfort-indispensable companions on any trekking tour. 2-section aluminum poles adjust with easy and secure twist-lock mechanisms. Compact plastic grips; comfortable wrist straps. The Komperdell Peak Hunter Junior Kids' Trekking Poles have easy-to-change trekking baskets and steel tips. Closeout.
